templates.title: Portainer Swarm 3-node environment
templates.description: A Docker (in Docker) Swarm 3-node environment that can be added to Portainer
templates.note:
This cluster is composed of 1 Swarm manager and 2 Swarm workers with the Portainer agent already deployed.
Wait for the manager container healthcheck to be ready before adding it as an environment in Portainer.
Use the IP address of the Docker host and the specified agent port to create an environment.
